page.title: 14HOMES
page.content: {MURSLEY}.SIXTY NINE PEOPLE WERE INTERVIEWED LIVING IN BOTH RENTED AND OWNED PROPERTY.MOST OF THE PEOPLE HAVE LIVED HERE FOR UNDER FIVE YEARS THE NEXT HIGHEST CATEGORY HAVE LIVED HERE BETWEEN FIVE AND TWENTY FIVE YEARS. TWENTY SIX HOUSES HAD TWO PEOPLE LIVING IN THEM WITH EIGHTEEN HAVING THREE OR FOUR.MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE CENTRALLY HEATED BUT MOST PEOPLE USE OPEN FIRES AS WELL.THE NUMBER OF CHILDREN IN THE HOUSES INTERVIEWED UNDER SEVENTEEN YEARS WERE THIRTY TWO. THE MOST POPULAR ANIMALS WERE DOGS (TWENTY EIGHT),NEXT CAME CATS(TWENTY SIX),HOSES WERE ALSO QUITE POPULAR (EIGHTEEN).MOST COOK BY ELECTRICITY. HARDLY ANY OF THE FOOD IS GROWN AT HOME.MOST PEOPLE USING THE VILLAGE SHOPS FOR ODD ITEMS.
